mapper.sql: la_id, la_user_id, la_cpt_id, la_reason, la_lend_time, la_return_time, la_commons, la_location, la_is_check, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3
mapper.insert:
insert into gd_lending_apply
la_id,
la_user_id,
la_cpt_id,
la_reason,
la_lend_time,
la_return_time,
la_commons,
la_location,
la_is_check,
attribute1,
attribute2,
attribute3,

mapper.update:
update gd_lending_apply
la_user_id = #{laUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
la_cpt_id = #{laCptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
la_reason = #{laReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
la_lend_time = #{laLendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
la_return_time = #{laReturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
la_commons = #{laCommons,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
la_location = #{laLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
la_is_check = #{laIsCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where la_id = #{laId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gd_lending_apply set la_user_id = #{laUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, la_cpt_id = #{laCptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, la_reason = #{laReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, la_lend_time = #{laLendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, la_return_time = #{laReturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, la_commons = #{laCommons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, la_location = #{laLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, la_is_check = #{laIsCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where la_id = #{laId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.cpt_name FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_computers c WHERE a.la_cpt_id = c.cpt_id AND a.la_user_id = #{laUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.*,c.cpt_name,u.user_name,u.attribute1 user_identity FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_computers c, gd_users u WHERE a.la_user_id = u.user_id AND a.la_cpt_id = c.cpt_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gd_lending_apply a WHERE la_cpt_id = #{laCptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.*, c.cpt_name FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_computers c WHERE a.la_cpt_id = c.cpt_id AND a.attribute1 = 'Y' AND a.la_is_check = 'Y' AND a.la_user_id = #{laUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
